definition: numeral-classifier compound (e.g. 一次、三套、五本 etc)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: The sentences in the construction are its instantiations and elaborations.
sentences.chinese: 這類句子例示或詳述的是雙數量詞構式。

sentences.english: You can put a noun after a quantifier when you are talking about members of a group in general…
sentences.chinese: 當提到一般的羣體成員時，用數量詞修飾名詞。
